A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's terrible what Disney is doing to Star Wars. They turned George Lucas's epic imaginative space opera full of mythological\, spiritual\, psychological and political elements into a soulless generic movie about spaceships. Disney stomped on all the Star Wars themes like a herd of angry elephants. The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi has no story\, no character development\, no substance\, no meaning. It was like watching a SW parody: Spaceballs 2.
